summary:
Over the past years I have had the privilege to apply my experience and knowledge in diverse companies and environments: from (grid) operators to contractors, from small business to multinationals. I have participated in various project teams. I have been responsible for the daily managing direct and indirect reports. Managing Internal and external (contracted) work, efficient and effective deployment of the team and her specialists. Initiated and implemented improvements for processes and procedures These processes were revised in consultation with the departments concerned. Furthermore, I have been responsible for achieving the KPI’s within the prescribed technical and financial framework. 

As a person I'm at my best in a dynamic environment that asks for pragmatic and solution-oriented thinking and flexibility. I believe that the freedom to  autonomously making decisions and taking ownership is a necessity for the optimal result.

Part of this strategy is a countrywide state-of-the-art fiber network, including a Submarine cable between main land and the Cayes. This network exists of a mixture of GPON and P2P. My main activities and responsibilities were: 
▪	Writing the Program of Requirements and Standard Operating Procedures, such as:
▫	Naming and labeling convention, 
▫	Construction package,
▫	Design process, rules & procedures,
▫	Network Build Program (SOP),
▫	Site Survey (when no GIS information exists),
▫	Network Resource Inventory Management System,
▫	Homes Connect Process.

▪	Training and coaching the fixed and transport network engineering department to fix the basics, which included hard and soft skills: 
▫	Managing costs, cost conscious engineering,
▫	Fiber networks, FttX and Dark Fiber,
▫	OTDR measurement and interpretation,
▫	Program of requirements, specifications and interpretation,
▫	Database related engineering tools,
▫	Architecture development 
▫	Soft Skills, such as:
•	Time Management,
•	Development of Processes and Standard Operating Procedures,
•	Continues Improvement of processes and procedures,
•	How to be effective and efficient,
•	Improvement of the internal/external written and oral communication,
•	Advance in Excel.

▪	Implementation of network resource inventory management system, including the applicable process and procedures.

Business or sector Operator

Project: Destination Greatness, National Broadband Plan, Mobile Evolution Plan, Transport Evolution Plan, Fixed Evolution Plan, Billing System, Network Resource Inventory Management System, Sales Jobs, Unplanned Projects and Submarine Cable.', 'title': 'Senior Telecommunications Specialist', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Belize', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Digi Belize', 'description': 'Belize Telemedia Ltd, BTL is the leading telecoms provider in Belize, Central America/Caribbean. As Senior Manager Network Engineering I am responsible for the Fixed & Transport Network Engineering department. Responsible for the team and their deliverables for multiple projects and the Destination Greatness strategy. 
Key-facts for Destination Greatness:
▪	Become part of TOP 3 in the Caribbean region by 2020 in down- and upload speeds.
▫	By deploying 130+ LTE Advanced Cell Sites
•	By early 2018, became #1 on mobile speeds in the Caribbean and Southern Americas. -Ookla Statistics
▫	By deploying countrywide a fiber optic network
•	By early 2018, the fixed network up- and download speeds has increased 130%
•	By oct 2018, in about a year, we have deployed a network for more than 45000 potential customers and connected 12000 customers.
▪	Deployment of Submarine cable between Belize-City and San Pedro

My main activities and responsibilities were:
▪	Daily management of:
▫	21 direct reports and 30+ indirect reports, 
▫	Internal and external (contracted) deliverables,
▪	Continued development of resources
▫	Hard and soft skill trainings,
▫	Transformation from task orientated working to self-steering and data driven analysis
▫	Cultural Change in way of working, processes and procedures.

▪	Process and Procedures development, maturing and implementation across CTO Division:
▫	Material, Resource and Project Management
▫	Program and Project specific processes and procedures.
▪	Deliverables for multiple programs and projects, such as:
▫	Fixed Evolution Program, ~US$50 Million.
•	Countrywide GIS data collection,
•	Countrywide fiber to the home design and deployment,
▫	Mobile Evolution Program, ~US$25 Million.
•	Deployment of 130+ new LTE Advanced Sites,
▫	Transport Evolution Program, ~US$10 Million.
•	Countrywide backbone design en deployment
•	IP-Audit.
▫	Sales Jobs
•	First international customer connected,
•	VIP and P1 customers such as government and corporate customers.', 'title': 'Senior manager engineering', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1299662, 'name': 'Stam&Co Infratechniek
